## packet ip unassign

Unassigns an IP address.

### Synopsis

Example:

packet ip unassign --id [assignment-UUID]

	

```
packet ip unassign [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help        help for unassign
  -i, --id string   UUID of the assignment
```
